description: Welcome to the Economy cabin, where you'll enjoy a seat that combines elegance and comfort.
title: Economy seat

description: Depending on the time of day, you'll be served a range of refreshments: a pastry in the morning, a fresh sandwich at mealtime and a light treat in the afternoon. A large choice of drinks are also available
title: In-flight services

description: Travel comfortably in a seat located at the front of the aircraft.
title: Business seat

description: Download your favorite newspapers and magazines free of charge, starting 30 hours before your flight.
title: Air France Play app
